sect1.title: Introduction to the HPCC JAPIs
sect1.para: The HPCC Java APIs is a collection Java based APIs which help developers interact with HPCC servers and tools in a relatively simple, and standardized fashion.
The project houses multiple HPCC centric Java based APIs and tools.
The project is available on Github in the HPCC-JAPIs repository.

sect2.title: wsclient
sect2.para: The API which standardizes and facilitates interaction with HPCC Web based Services (ESP Web services).
The project is based on stub code generated from WSDL using Eclipse tools based on Apache Axis.
Provides a mechanism for actuating HPCC web service methods.

sect2.title: clienttools
sect2.para: Java based interface to HPCC client tools. Currently only interfaces with the ECLCC Server.

sect2.title: rdf2hpcc
sect2.para: RDF data ingestion tool to HPCC. Based on Apache Jena and is dependent on wsclient.
